readable.title: 2873431806_86a56cdae8
readable.content: A child wearing pink boots is splashing in a puddle behind the red truck . A kid jumps in a puddle . A little girl in her rain boots jumps in a puddle . A little girl is about to jump into a mud puddle with her flower rain boots . A little girl wearing rain boots is jumping off the sidewalk into a puddle of muddy water .
